Builds computer vision models with minimal data

Related repos

  • Open vision-language models that compete with closed-source alternatives using fully open data
  • OpenAI API for Apple Intelligence models
  • Open-source cloud OS for running AI models locally
  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • Generates 3D models from text
  • End-to-end autonomous driving with vision-language-action models
  • Generates maps and 3D models from drone imagery
  • Big Vision: codebase for training large-scale vision models using Jax/Flax andTPUs
